TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaCollectionEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator

Docs.summary: Supports a simple iteration over a collection. This class cannot be inherited.
Gets the current <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> in the collection.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each of the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the schema collection.
[!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

Docs.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next schema in the collection.
Docs.returns: if the move was successful; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each of the XML Schemas in the schema collection.
[!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.schema.xmls_1_1.cpp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollectionEnumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
